page.title: 16Youth Club
page.content:
The {Youth Club}is held in the {Institute}on{Wednesday}nights. You pay 20p to get in and Â£l membership. The hall costs Â£3 for the night.
The age group is{l0 to l7 years. The drinks are non-alcoholic and you are not allowed to smoke or to be stupid, like turning on and off the lights.
It runs from{7 o'clock to half {past nine}each week. Also there are {outings}to various places of interest arranged for the childrens entertain- ment, these are organized by the youth club committee.
They are now selling{T-shirts}at the Youth Club with the name of the club on. The Youth Club has been running since{January l985.
